markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{lax3}}.

## Background

Built out of hardened vithrack and spider excreta hardened into a stone-like material over decades of use, this nest houses [Sissak](/sissak/), the master of the vithrack hive that protects the Collections wing.

## Points of interest

* A straightforward combat arena. Approaching Sissak will trigger a confrontation unless the player already has the [Warden Contract](/wardenContract/), which allows for a non-violent resolution.

## Characters

* [Sissak](/sissak/), vithrack.

## Loot

* [The Third Eye](/theThirdEye/): Dropped by Sissak.

==Background==
Built out of hardened vithrack and spider excreta hardened into a stone-like material over decades of use, this nest houses [[Sissak]], the master of the vithrack hive that protects the Collections wing.
==Points of interest==
